dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Almaty International Airport had a system malfunction this morning, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Almaty International Airport had a system malfunction this morning, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A system malfunction at Almaty International Airport led to flight delays on the morning of May 5.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, uh, on May 5th. It was in the domestic flights area.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, uh, on May fifth. It was in the domestic flights area.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A system malfunction at Almaty International Airport led to flight delays on the morning of May 5. Passengers reported disruptions in the domestic flights area.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Passengers were saying it caused a total standstill for a bit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Passengers were saying it caused a total standstill for a bit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to eyewitnesses, the issue caused a temporary standstill in passenger flow.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, the access control system failed, so they had to do extra security screening.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, the access control system failed, so they had to do extra security screening.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Later, the airport's press service confirmed that a brief technical failure occurred in the access control system at the domestic arrivals area, resulting in a temporary mixing of passenger streams. In accordance with established security protocols, an additional screening of passengers was conducted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But they said the average delay was only like 25 minutes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But they said the average delay was only like twenty five minutes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The average delay did not exceed 25 minutes, the airport said in a statement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they handled it pretty quickly, no major schedule impact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they handled it pretty quickly, no major schedule impact.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The process was handled promptly and had no significant impact on the overall schedule.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Still, must've been frustrating for people trying to catch flights.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, must've been frustrating for people trying to catch flights.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And this is on top of those airspace closures near Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And this is on top of those airspace closures near Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Almaty Airport had informed passengers that, according to Kazakhstan's Ministry of Defense, airspace over Astana would be closed daily from 10:00 to 13:00 between April 22 and May 7 for military parade preparations.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, the military parade prepsâ€”airspace closed daily 10 to 1, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, the military parade preps-airspace closed daily ten to one, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Almaty Airport had informed passengers that, according to Kazakhstan's Ministry of Defense, airspace over Astana would be closed daily from 10:00 to 13:00 between April 22 and May 7 for military parade preparations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, from April 22nd to May 7th. So some flights from Almaty got rescheduled too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, from April twenty second to May seventh. So some flights from Almaty got rescheduled too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This has caused changes to some flight schedules to and from Astana, including flights from Almaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kind of a rough week for air travel in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kind of a rough week for air travel in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: At least things are back to normal now at Almaty, they apologized and everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: At least things are back to normal now at Almaty, they apologized and everything.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The airport apologized for any inconvenience and confirmed that operations have since returned to normal.
